structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text: The county judge/executive of each county, by order of record, shall direct the sheriff of that county to advertise the election, and the object thereof by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 150, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 15. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 4.
